title: Walking tour of the historic center of Mexico City
details:
Itinerary:
Shamans' Area
Archaeological Zone of Templo Mayor (outside the museum)
Interior of the Metropolitan Cathedral
Lobby of Gran Hotel México
Casa de los Azulejos
Postal Palace
Lobby of the Palacio de Bellas Artes
Handicrafts Market
include:
Include:
● Guide
● Bottle of water
● Street food tastings
● Full access ticket to the Museum of Fine Arts or the Templo Mayor Museum

title: Know the Guadalupan Codex and the culture of this precinct
details:
Itinerary:
● New Basilica
● Old Houses
● Tepeyac Hill
● Handicrafts Market
include:
Include:
● Guide
● Bottle of water
● Access to the Basilica, chapels, bell tower, and market

title: Explore to the interior and viewpoint of the Monument to the Mexican Revolution
include:
Include:
● Guide
● General access ticket
● Bottle of water

title: A Royal Experience: Gardens and Views of Chapultepec Castle and Forest
include:
Include:
● Guide
● General access ticket to Chapultepec Castle
● Bottle of water

title: Explore Aztec Culture: Museum of Anthropology and Chapultepec Park
details:
Itinerary:
● Chapultepec Forest
● Botanical Garden
● Papantla Flyers
● Mexica Hall at the Museum of Anthropology
include:
Include:
● Guide
● General access ticket to the Anthropology Museum
● Bottle of water

title: Salsa Night in CDMX: Dance and Enjoy the Vibes
include:
Include:
● Guide
● Dance class
● Entrance to the dance hall
● Dinner (tacos)
● 1 drink at the dance hall
● Private transportation

title: Counterculture and Urban Art: Exploring the Alternative Soul of CDMX
details:
Itinerary:
● Museo Universitario del Chopo
● Barrio Santa Maria la Ribera
● Biblioteca Vasconcelos
● Tianguis Cultural del Chopo
include:
Include:
● Guide
● Street drinks tasting
● General admission to the Museo Universitario del Chopo
● Bottle of water

title: History, Culture and Daily Life Walk in Tlatelolco and La Lagunilla Market
details:
Itinerary:
● Zona arqueológica Tlatelolco
● Tianguis de la Lagunilla
include:
Include:
● Guide
● General admission to the Tlatelolco archaeological site
● Food and drink tastings at the La Lagunilla market
● Bottle of water

title: Get to Know Tepito: The Heart of Mexican Culture and Commerce
details:
Itinerary:
● Centro cultural Tepito
● Plaza Fray Bartolomé
● Mercado de Tepito
● Museo del Mezcal y Tequila
include:
Include:
● Guide
● Food and drink tastings at the Tepito market
● Bottle of water
● Admission to the Mezcal and Tequila Museum
